lead_paragraph: LUCAS--Thomas Parker, born on May 31, 1934, grew up in Manhattan before moving to Queens to raise a family. Tom served in the National Guard from 1952-1966 and attained the rank of Captain with 1,000 hours of flying time. Tom believed in the value of education and made a career as a biology teacher at Forest Hills High School. Tom joined Church on the Hill in 1964 where he became a dedicated member to the church and its congregation. Tom was a loving and generous family man. He leaves his wife of 58 years, Helen; three daughters, Linda, Nancy and Susan; and family. He died peacefully at his home on January 19, 2016. 1/3
